Text:
I understand you're willing to help....

But dude,when you upload a match, NEVER do that with the final score.NEVER! Many people cannot watch the game as it's broadcasted,avoid websites and everything to try to watch it at home as a live transmission.

Well said "just another apprentice"! I have had complete media shut out all evening, no phone, internet, TV nothing in order to watch the game from here.  Search for the game and I'm presented with the final fucking score! Echoeing your words its great this guy wnated to help but what the fuck! Complete bollox! I'm gutted!
Mountain-Diouf, you are a fucking idiot. Do NOT post the score, you tosser.

Sorry guys its my 1st upload 
why the bad words everyone ??

Can't believe you posted the score. Gah, ruined my evening...

Thanks anyway...
I signed up SPECIFICALLY to tell you that you must be the most fucking stupid cunt to ever live !! Why would you give away the final score !?!?! WHY ? You've ruined my morning, fuck you !

Mountain-Diouf ... I didn't mean to offend you. I think you made a great job by trying to help others.But in the future,have this in mind,okay?As GBJL wrote,many people do avoid tv,internet and everything,which is my case as well.As a community,we have to respect each other so,those tough words are nothing more than ways to let this disappointment out...life goes on...
